00028 // This is a nicely working DNS resolver that uses the QHostInfo interface
00029 // and thus gets rid of all the ugly OS dependancies we have.
00030 // It should be sufficient to rename this file and use this class
00031 // instead of the old KviDnsResolver.
00032 
00033 // However at present time (04.01.2010) QHostInfo doesn't seem to support
00034 // IPv6. Despite the documentation saying that IPv6 addresses are supported
00035 // the query performed by QHostInfo::lookupHost() asks only for the A record.
00036 //
00037 // Check it again with newer Qt versions and verify.
00038 
00039 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00040 
00041 #include <KviError.h> // FIXME: Get rid of this at all..
00042 #include <KviPointerList.h>
00043 
00044 #include <QObject>
00045 
00046 class KviDnsResolverPrivate;
00047 
00048 class QHostInfo;
00049 
00056 class KVILIB_API KviDnsResolver : public QObject
00057 {
00058         Q_OBJECT
00059 
00060 public:
00061 
00065         KviDnsResolver(QObject * pParent = NULL);
00066 
00071         virtual ~KviDnsResolver();
00072 
00073 public:
00074 
00075         enum QueryType
00076         {
00077                 IPv4,
00078                 IPv6,
00079                 Any
00080         };
00081 
00082         enum State
00083         {
00084                 Idle,
00085                 Busy,
00086                 Failure,
00087                 Success
00088         };
00089 
00090 private:
00091 
00092         KviDnsResolverPrivate * m_pPrivateData;
00093 
00094 public:
00095 
00099         State state() const;
00100 
00105         bool lookup(const QString & szQuery,QueryType eType);
00106 
00107         // Results (return always non null-data..but valid results only if state() == Success or Failure)
00108         KviError::Code error() const; // DEPRECATED use errorString()
00109         const QString & errorString() const;
00110 
00111         const QString & hostName() const;
00112         const QString & firstIpAddress();
00113         int ipAddressCount() const;
00114         KviPointerList<QString> * ipAddressList();
00115         const QString & query() const;
00116         bool isRunning() const;
00117 
00118 private slots:
00119         void slotHostLookupTerminated(const QHostInfo &oHostInfo);
00120 
00121 signals:
00122         void lookupDone(KviDnsResolver *);
00123
